name: Pea and chorizo pasta
description: A quick and easy, creamy mid week pasta meal
keywords: weeknight, pea, chorizo, cream, pasta, cheese

recipeInstructions.name: Cook pasta
recipeInstructions.text: Bring a saucepan of water to the boil and begin cooking the pasta.

itemListElement.text: Place the peas in a microwavable steamer and cook according to packet instructions.
Stir the peas half way through cooking to ensure they cook evenly.

recipeInstructions.name: Chop ingredients
recipeInstructions.text: Finely dice the onion and chorizo, finely chop the parsley if using.

recipeInstructions.name: Saute
recipeInstructions.text: Once the pasta has cooked reserve a cup of the cooking liquid and drain. Return the saucepan to the heat and add the oil, once the oil is hot add the onion and chorizo.

recipeInstructions.name: Sauce
recipeInstructions.text: Once the onion is soft, the chorizo is cooked and enough of the chorizo oil has rendered out add the cream and chicken stock and turn the heat down to low.

recipeInstructions.name: Combine
recipeInstructions.text: Return the pasta to the pan, add the cooked peas and parsley if using, stir to combine, grind in fresh black pepper and season.

recipeInstructions.name: Plate, grate parmessan over to taste and serve.
